issue.title: [Benchmarking] Performs a benchmark run with archery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5071](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5071). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Run all regression benchmarks, consume output and re-format according to the format required by dev/benchmarking specification and/or push to upstream database.

This would be implemented as `archery benchmark run`. Provide facility to save/load results as a StaticRunner (such that it can be re-used in comparison without running the benchmark again).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5071?focusedCommentId=16835675) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4249
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4249>
